comment:
* A specific type of credential request to be sent to the provider during the query phase of
 * a get flow. This request contains limited parameters needed to populate a list of
 * {@link CredentialEntry} on the {@link BeginGetCredentialResponse}.

variables.name: mId
variables.comment: * A unique id associated with this request option.

methods.name: public String getId()
methods.comment: * Returns the unique id associated with this request. This is for internal use only.

methods.name: public Bundle getCandidateQueryData()
methods.comment:
* Returns the request candidate query data, denoting a set of parameters * that can be used to populate a candidate list of credentials, as * {@link CredentialEntry} on {@link BeginGetCredentialResponse}. This list * of entries is then presented to the user on a selector. * *

This data does not contain any sensitive parameters, and will be sent * to all eligible providers. * The complete set of parameters will only be set on the {@link android.app.PendingIntent} * set on the {@link CredentialEntry} that is selected by the user.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
